title: Memory video 820-2915
message:
i need to change memory on this board but can i change H5GQ1H24AFR by H5GQ2H24MFR?
thanks

title: Memory video 820-2915
message: Yes, but why? These chips never fail.

title: Memory video 820-2915
message: I had some boards where gpu replacment doesnot work and vram yes.

title: Memory video 820-2915
message: The chips don't fail. You can reball the old ones. Also these boards suffer from cracked traces under the VRAM and will continue to return if there were issues after GPU replacement.

title: Memory video 820-2915
message:
is it possible to see the cracked trace with microscope? do you have video for reball the memory? is it same method like the SMC?
thanks

title: Memory video 820-2915
message: Crack is inside the board. Reball is with stencil and 0.45mm balls.
